About Me

Hello! My name is Chenyang Wan(万晨阳), and you can call me Bryce as well. I’m currently a third-year undergraduate student at College of Control Science and Engineering(CSE), Zhejiang University(ZJU). I also take courses in Advanced Honor Class of Engineering Education(ACEE), Chu Kochen Honors College as a minor.

My research interests include robotics(particularly in robot navigation and trajectory planning), computer vision, and machine learning.

Now I am an internship student in the Robotics Lab of Zhejiang University. My research work focusing on the mutual localization in multi-robot systems and the application of reinforcement learning in robot navigation.


Research Experience


Interests

I am interested in technology trends.
I’m always learning C++, and I enjoy using Python.
